bike.description: 100% Cr-Mo. 20.75" TT, MID BB shell, tig welded, formed DT/TT, externally relieved integrated HT w/ stamped "S" logo, wrap gusset BB yoke, seat-stay mounted U-brake bosses, integrated seat collar, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Specialized 1.4mm Cr-Mo 1-1/4" blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 2mm thick Hi-Ten steerer, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle
FSA Impact, 1-1/8" threadless, integrated
Fuse forged alloy, 50mm extension, 1 1/8" A-Head
Hi-Ten 2pc., 560mm wide, 165mm rise, 11 degree back, 4 degree up sweep
Fuse File, Kraton w/ flange
Tektro FX-15, cold forged, double bushing, linear spring, 15mm offset arms, soft compound pads
Tektro 275A, cold forged two finger lever, 15mm cable pull
Odyssey 1/2" x 1/8" x 13t for M30 thread
Tig welded Tubular Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 175mm length
CNC cut 6061 28t w/ Motostar design
Mid BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm 8 spline Cr-Mo BB spindle, alloy tube and cone spacers
Specialized low profile, 9/16", sealed cartridge bearing, alloy platform, removable pins
Fuse Double, double wall w/ eyelets
Specialized Fuse, 36h, sealed mech., mid flange, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle
Specialized Fuse, 36h, 14mm hollow axle cassette hub w/ 10t cog driver, loos ball
2.0mm (14g) stainless w/ brass nipple
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.1", 30TPI, wire bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.1", 30TPI, wire bead
Specialized schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse Jump, 8mm rail, PVC bumpers front and rear
Specialized alloy, 2 bolt, no offset, 25.4mm
Cr-Mo seat pin, allen key type
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors, 2x heat treated steel axle pegs w/ anti-spin hardware
